name: True Love
content: I give to you  and you give to me
我爱你跟你爱我一样多
So on and on  It'll always be
For you and I  have a guardian angel
On high  with nothing to do
But to give to you  and to give to me
但我爱你跟你爱我一样多
I give to you  and you give to me
我爱你跟你爱我一样多
So on and on  It'll always be
For you and I  have a guardian angel
On high  with nothing to do
On high  with nothing to do
But to give to you  and to give to me
但我爱你跟你爱我一样多
